の直接の続編となる。



。 しかし、魔法界と無法界を脅かす新たな災厄が現れた...
。 災厄の予兆により、数ヶ月ぶりに再会したミライとリコ。謎の敵に立ち向かおうとする中、2人は過去だけでなく未来にも直面する。 (ソース：Anime News Network, Crunchyroll, edited)

en-us:
The Aquarion, a giant mechanized fighting suit, is humanity’s best weapon against interstellar threats. Human pilots trained and worked together to defeat Shadow Angels, invading Abductors, and kinetic energy monsters over thousands of years. Once again, humanity must turn to the Aquarion. With the fate of the Earth hanging in the balance, will the suit be enough to save mankind?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
pt-br:
O Aquarion, um traje de combate mecanizado gigante, é a melhor arma da humanidade contra ameaças interestelares. Os pilotos humanos treinaram e trabalharam juntos para derrotar os Shadow Angels, os Abductors invasores e os monstros de energia cinética durante milhares de anos. Mais uma vez, a humanidade precisa recorrer ao Aquarion. Com o destino da Terra em jogo, será que o traje será suficiente para salvar a humanidade?

(Fonte: Crunchyroll)
ja:
巨大な機械化戦闘スーツであるアクエリオンは、恒星間の脅威に対する人類の最高の武器である。人類のパイロットは何千年もの間、シャドー・エンジェル、侵略者アブダクター、運動エネルギー・モンスターを倒すために訓練し、協力し合ってきた。再び、人類はアクエリオンに頼らなければならない。

(提供：クランチロール）

en-us:
The second season of UniteUp!

PROTOSTAR’s journey continues as they face rivals and challenges, striving to shine in the competitive idol world.

(Source: Crunchyroll News)
pt-br:
A segunda temporada de UniteUp!

A jornada do PROTOSTAR continua enquanto eles enfrentam rivais e desafios, se esforçando para brilhar no competitivo mundo dos ídolos.

(Fonte: Crunchyroll News)
ja:
ユナイトアップ！
のセカンド・シーズン。 PROTOSTARの旅は、ライバルや困難に立ち向かいながら、競争の激しいアイドル界で輝こうと努力し続ける


。 (提供：クランチロールニュース）

en-us: The second season of Kinnikuman: Kanpeki Choujin Shiso-hen.
pt-br: A segunda temporada de Kinnikuman: Kanpeki Choujin Shiso-hen.
ja: キン肉マン 完ペキ超人死闘編』の第2シーズン。

en-us: A tournament to decide the strongest Vanguard cardfighter "Deluxe", Akina and the other fighters have received an invitation to the tournament. This time, many legendary fighters will also be participating!
pt-br: Akina e os outros lutadores receberam um convite para o torneio para decidir o mais forte lutador de cartas Vanguard "Deluxe". Desta vez, muitos lutadores lendários também estarão participando!
ja: ヴァンガード最強のカードファイター "デラックス "を決める大会への招待状が届いたアキナたち。今回はレジェンドファイターも多数参加する！

en-us:
A new entry in the Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru series, in which the main character, fourth grader Wataru Hoshibe, appears as a RyuTuber aiming to become a superstar, and battles with his partner Ryuujinmaru in an alternate world of floating blocks to defeat the last boss “Enjoda”.

(Source: Oricon, translated)
pt-br:
Uma nova entrada na série Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru, na qual o personagem principal, Wataru Hoshibe, aluno da quarta série, aparece como um RyuTuber com o objetivo de se tornar uma superestrela e luta com seu parceiro Ryuujinmaru em um mundo alternativo de blocos flutuantes para derrotar o último chefe "Enjoda".

(Fonte: Oricon, traduzido)
ja:
主人公の小学4年生・星部ワタルがスーパースターを目指すRyuTuberとして登場し、相棒の龍神丸とともに、ブロックが浮かぶ異世界でラスボス「円城寺」を倒す


『魔神英雄伝ワタル』シリーズの新作。 (出典：オリコン、翻訳）

en-us: Fourteenth season of Yami Shibai.
pt-br: Décima quarta temporada de Yami Shibai.
ja: 闇芝居の第14シーズン。

en-us: Second season of 0-saiji Start Dash Monogatari.
pt-br: Segunda temporada de 0-saiji Start Dash Monogatari.
ja: 0才スタートダッシュ物語』の第2シーズン。

en-us: A sequel to Kankin Kuiki Level X.
pt-br: Uma sequência do Kankin Kuiki Level X.
ja: 観戦記レベルX』の続編。

en-us: The anime centers on the LINE FRIENDS "minini" non-verbal palm-sized characters surviving in the human world.
pt-br: O anime é centrado nos "minini" LINE FRIENDS, personagens não verbais do tamanho da palma da mão que sobrevivem no mundo humano.
ja: このアニメは、LINE FRIENDSの "ミニ "と呼ばれる手のひらサイズの言葉を発しないキャラクターたちが人間界で生き抜く姿を描いている。

en-us: Compilation movie of Kaijuu 8-gou.
pt-br: Filme de compilação de Kaijuu 8-gou.
ja: 怪獣8号」の総集編。

en-us:
Set in modern day Shibuya, Ichika Hoshino, a high school girl and street musician, encounters an unknown version of Hatsune Miku after hearing a Miku song that she'd never heard before in a CD store. Ichika learns that this version of Miku is having trouble reaching people with her songs, so together they team up to try to touch the hearts of their audience through music.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)
pt-br:
Situado na Shibuya moderna, Ichika Hoshino, uma garota do ensino médio e músico de rua, encontra uma versão desconhecida de Hatsune Miku depois de ouvir uma música de Miku que ela nunca tinha ouvido antes em uma loja de CDs. Ichika descobre que essa versão de Miku está tendo problemas para alcançar as pessoas com suas músicas, então, juntas, elas se unem para tentar tocar o coração de seu público por meio da música.

(Fonte: Crunchyroll News, editado)
ja:
現代の渋谷を舞台に、ストリートミュージシャンの女子高生・星野いちかは、CDショップで聴いたことのない初音ミクの曲に出会う。一華は、このバージョンのミクが自分の歌を人々に届けることに問題を抱えていることを知り、二人で手を組み、音楽を通して聴衆の心を動かそうとする。

(出典：クランチロールニュース、編集部)

en-us:
The story is centered around the main character, Akira, and his scientifically created girlfriend, No. 0.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
pt-br:
A história é centrada no personagem principal, Akira, e em sua namorada criada cientificamente, No. 0.

(Fonte: Crunchyroll)
ja:
物語の中心は主人公のアキラと、科学的に作られたガールフレンドの0号だ。
(出典：クランチロール）

en-us:
Movie project commemorating the 50th anniversary of the Versailles no Bara manga's publication.

Hoping to unite their countries with an alliance, The Empress of Austria arranges her daughter, the delightful yet spoiled Marie Antoinette, to marry the crown prince of France, Louis XVI. Upon arriving in Versailles, the Austrian princess meets Oscar Francois de Jarjayes, Captain of the Royal Guards—a seemingly dashing young man—but to Antoinette's astonishment, he is in fact a woman!

The youngest daughter of a noble family with a prominent lack of a male heir, Oscar was raised as a boy to continue the family's military legacy. Suffocated by the rigid rules associated with her new position and longing for companionship, Antoinette immediately takes a liking to this intriguing young woman, and wastes no time befriending her. However, as the childish new queen foolishly abuses her power, Oscar is conflicted between maintaining her loyalty to the royal family and addressing the growing concern of poverty among the common people.

Recalling the events of the French Revolution, Versailles no Bara depicts the struggles of two women unjustly burdened by family expectations. Yet, despite being forced to deny their identities at the expense of personal happiness, they march on to become key players in the annals of history.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)
pt-br:
Projeto de filme em comemoração ao 50º aniversário da publicação do mangá Versailles no Bara.

Na esperança de unir seus países por meio de uma aliança, a Imperatriz da Áustria arranja sua filha, a encantadora e mimada Maria Antonieta, para se casar com o príncipe herdeiro da França, Luís XVI. Ao chegar a Versalhes, a princesa austríaca conhece Oscar François de Jarjayes, capitão da Guarda Real - um jovem aparentemente arrojado -, mas, para a surpresa de Antonieta, ele é, na verdade, uma mulher!

Filha mais nova de uma família nobre que não tinha um herdeiro homem, Oscar foi criado ainda menino para dar continuidade ao legado militar da família. Sufocada pelas regras rígidas associadas à sua nova posição e desejosa de companhia, Antoinette imediatamente se afeiçoa a essa jovem intrigante e não perde tempo em fazer amizade com ela. No entanto, como a nova rainha infantil abusa tolamente de seu poder, Oscar fica em conflito entre manter sua lealdade à família real e lidar com a crescente preocupação com a pobreza entre as pessoas comuns.

Relembrando os eventos da Revolução Francesa, Versailles no Bara retrata as lutas de duas mulheres injustamente sobrecarregadas pelas expectativas familiares. No entanto, apesar de serem forçadas a negar suas identidades em detrimento da felicidade pessoal, elas marcham para se tornarem protagonistas nos anais da história.

(Fonte: MAL Rewrite)
ja:
漫画『ベルサイユのばら』刊行50周年を記念した映画企画。

オーストリア皇后は、同盟を結んで両国の結束を図ろうと、娘のマリー・アントワネットをフランスの皇太子ルイ16世と結婚させる。ヴェルサイユに到着したオーストリア王女は、王宮衛兵隊長のオスカル・フランソワ・ド・ジャルジャイズに出会う！




ヴェルサイユのばら』は、フランス革命を想起させながら、家族の期待に不当に背負わされた2人の女性の葛藤を描いている。

「ベルサイユのばら」では、家族の期待に不当に背負わされた2人の女性の葛藤が描かれている。

en-us: Theatrical follow-up to the TV anime Senpai wa Otokonoko.
pt-br: Sequência teatral do anime de TV Senpai wa Otokonoko.
ja: TVアニメ『先輩は男の娘』の劇場版。

pt-br: Sequência de Mononoke: Karakasa e segundo filme da trilogia de filmes Mononoke.
ja: もののけ』の続編：映画『もののけ』3部作の2作目。

en-us: A movie compilation of the first and second cours of Aldnoah.Zero and also includes the new animation to conclude the series, Aldnoah.Zero: Ame no Danshou.
pt-br: Uma compilação de filmes do primeiro e segundo cours de Aldnoah.Zero e também inclui a nova animação para concluir a série, Aldnoah.Zero: Ame no Danshou.
ja: アルドノア・ゼロ』の1クール目と2クール目の総集編で、シリーズ完結編となる新作アニメ『アルドノア・ゼロ 雨のダンショ』も収録。

en-us:
A new film announced for the 10th anniversary of Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu.

Note: Relations are provisional and will be updated when more info is announced.
pt-br:
Um novo filme anunciado para o 10º aniversário de Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu.

Nota: As relações são provisórias e serão atualizadas quando mais informações forem anunciadas.
ja:
『美男高校地球防衛部』10周年記念の新作発表。

注：関係は暫定的なものであり、詳細が発表され次第更新されます。

en-us:
Doraemon, Nobita, and friends enter a painting into a medieval European world. In the painting, they meet Claire and Milo, children from the country of Artoria. They also encounter a small demon with wings named Chai. Together, they face a powerful enemy for a legendary jewel.

(Source: Anime News Network)
pt-br:
Doraemon, Nobita e seus amigos entram em uma pintura em um mundo medieval europeu. Na pintura, eles conhecem Claire e Milo, crianças do país de Artoria. Eles também encontram um pequeno demônio com asas chamado Chai. Juntos, eles enfrentam um poderoso inimigo por uma joia lendária.

(Fonte: Anime News Network)
ja: ドラえもんとのび太たちは、絵の中に入って中世ヨーロッパの世界を冒険する。絵の中でドラえもんたちは、アルトリア国の子どもクレアとマイロに出会う。そして、翼の生えた小悪魔チャイにも出会う。伝説の宝石をめぐり、彼らは強大な敵に立ち向かう。

en-us: Theatrical follow-up to Thunderbolt Fantasy: Touriken Yuuki 4.
pt-br: Continuação teatral de Thunderbolt Fantasy: Touriken Yuuki 4.
ja: Thunderbolt Fantasy 東離劍遊紀4』の続編。

en-us:
The story centers on Miley, a young white tiger who is offered the lead role of Captain Hat by an acting troupe. Miley has no confidence in herself, so Shimajirou comes up with a plan to encourage her. Suddenly, they are sucked into a magical bag, and must embark on an adventure in the world within the bag.

(Source: Anime News Network)
pt-br:
A história gira em torno de Miley, uma jovem tigresa branca a quem é oferecido o papel principal de Captain Hat por um grupo de teatro. Miley não tem confiança em si mesma, então Shimajirou cria um plano para incentivá-la. De repente, eles são sugados para dentro de uma bolsa mágica e devem embarcar em uma aventura no mundo dentro da bolsa.

(Fonte: Anime News Network)
ja: 物語の中心は、演技集団からキャプテン・ハットの主役をオファーされた若い白虎のマイリー。自分に自信のないマイリーを励ますため、しまじろうはある計画を思いつく。突然、魔法の袋に吸い込まれた2人は、袋の中の世界で冒険を繰り広げることになる。

en-us:
Story begins when Koala asks Butt Detective to find a missing relative who disappeared from an idol contest. The case takes Butt Detective to Stardust Island, the site of the contest, and also the home of the international criminal organization Phantom Thief Academy, headed by Phantom Thief G. Here, the organization advances its secret conspiracy, codenamed the Dark Age Plan. Butt Detective enters Stardust Island under the guise of an idol. At the same time, he joins forces with Phantom Thief U, who is out to steal back the valuable Moonlight Stone from Phantom Thief G. The story will also reveal more about Brown's past.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)
pt-br:
A história começa quando Koala pede ao Butt Detective que encontre um parente desaparecido em um concurso de ídolos. O caso leva Butt Detective à Stardust Island, o local do concurso e também a sede da organização criminosa internacional Phantom Thief Academy, chefiada por Phantom Thief G. Lá, a organização promove sua conspiração secreta, cujo codinome é Dark Age Plan. O Butt Detective entra na Stardust Island disfarçado de ídolo. Ao mesmo tempo, ele une forças com Phantom Thief U, que quer roubar de volta a valiosa Moonlight Stone de Phantom Thief G. A história também revelará mais sobre o passado de Brown.

(Fonte: Anime News Network, editado)
ja: 物語は、コアラが尻探偵に、アイドルコンテストから姿を消した親戚の捜索を依頼するところから始まる。この事件で尻探偵は、コンテストの会場であり、怪盗G率いる国際犯罪組織・怪盗アカデミーの本拠地でもあるスターダスト・アイランドに向かう。尻探偵はアイドルを装ってスターダスト・アイランドに入る。同時に、怪盗Gから貴重なムーンライト・ストーンを奪い返そうとする怪盗Uと手を組む。

en-us:
When Sakamoto meets Aoi, the convenience store clerk, it’s love at first sight — and just like that, he retires.

Sakamoto gets married, has a daughter, opens a mom-and-pop store in a quiet town, and completely transforms … into a plus-size man. To ensure a peaceful life with his beloved family, the legendary ex–hit man bands together with comrades to face off against the looming threat of assassins.

(Source: Netflix TUDUM)

Note: The series is streaming a week in advance on Netflix Japan starting with episode 2 released alongside episode 1.
pt-br:
Quando Sakamoto conhece Aoi, a balconista da loja de conveniência, é amor à primeira vista - e, sem mais nem menos, ele se aposenta.

Sakamoto se casa, tem uma filha, abre uma loja familiar em uma cidade tranquila e se transforma completamente... em um homem plus size. Para garantir uma vida tranquila com sua amada família, o lendário ex-combatente se une a seus companheiros para enfrentar a ameaça iminente dos assassinos.

(Fonte: Netflix TUDUM)

Nota: A série está sendo transmitida com uma semana de antecedência na Netflix Japão, começando com o episódio 2 lançado junto com o episódio 1.
ja:
コンビニ店員の葵に一目惚れした坂本は、そのまま退職してしまう。

そして退職。 坂本は結婚し、娘が生まれ、静かな町で小さな店を開き、そして完全に変身する......プラスサイズの男に。愛する家族との平穏な生活を守るため、伝説の元殺し屋は仲間たちと結束し、迫りくる刺客の脅威に立ち向かう。




注：Netflix Japanでは、第1話と同時配信の第2話から1週間先行配信しています。

en-us:
In an alternate fantasy world, the Demon King reigns with a formidable army led by his Four Heavenly Kings. One happens to be Uchimura Denosuke, a normal salaryman unexpectedly plucked from his mundane life by the Demon King himself. But even in this new realm, Uchimura is bestowed no particular powers. Can he survive treacherous missions with only the knowledge of an office worker?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
pt-br:
Em um mundo de fantasia alternativo, o Rei Demônio reina com um exército formidável liderado por seus Quatro Reis Celestiais. Um deles é Uchimura Denosuke, um assalariado normal, inesperadamente arrancado de sua vida mundana pelo próprio Rei Demônio. Mas, mesmo nesse novo reino, Uchimura não tem poderes especiais. Será que ele conseguirá sobreviver a missões traiçoeiras apenas com o conhecimento de um funcionário de escritório?
. (Fonte: Crunchyroll)
ja:
異世界のファンタジーでは、魔王が四天王を中心とした強大な軍勢を率いて君臨している。その中の一人、内村伝之助は、平凡なサラリーマンだったが、魔王によって思いがけず引き抜かれてしまう。しかし、内村には新天地でも特別な力は与えられていない。果たして彼は、サラリーマンとしての知識だけで、危険なミッションを乗り切ることができるのか？
(提供：クランチロール）

en-us:
Original video animation for SK∞ (Sk8 the Infinity).

Note: Aniplex revealed during the "Sk8 Masquerade of Love" event that a new anime project for the original television anime SK∞ is in the works. Much later, revealed at the end of the "∞WEEK" special event, an OVA was announced alongside a second season.
Premiered in theaters on 01/24/2025. The home video was released on 03/19/2025.
Title and Relations are provisional and subject to change when more information is released.
pt-br:
Animação de vídeo original para SK∞ (Sk8 the Infinity).

Nota: A Aniplex revelou durante o evento "Sk8 Masquerade of Love" que um novo projeto de anime para o anime de televisão original SK∞ está em andamento. Muito mais tarde, revelado no final do evento especial "∞WEEK", um OVA foi anunciado juntamente com uma segunda temporada.
Estreou nos cinemas em 24/01/2025. O vídeo caseiro foi lançado em 19/03/2025.
O título e as relações são provisórios e estão sujeitos a alterações quando mais informações forem divulgadas.
ja:
SK∞（エスケーエイト・ザ・インフィニティ）のオリジナルビデオアニメーション。

注：アニプレックスは「Sk8 Masquerade of Love」イベントにおいて、オリジナルTVアニメ『SK∞』の新アニメプロジェクトが進行中であることを明らかにした。その後、「∞WEEK」スペシャルイベントの最後に明らかにされ、2期と同時にOVAが発表された。 劇場公開は2025年01月24日。ホームビデオは2025/03/19発売。
タイトルおよび関係は仮のものであり、詳細が発表され次第変更される場合があります。

en-us:
In order to protect an ordinary businessman, Tsukasa Atsumi, from demons, a genius kunoichi, Shizuri Ideura, signs a master-servant contract with him on the condition that she stays with him. Despite her cool appearance of defeating demons, Shizuri is an otaku NEET who spends all her time playing video games. While Shizuri is spoiled by Tsukasa and leads a lazy cohabitation life, the quirky Kunoichi gather together... A romantic comedy about living together with a genius Kunoichi who is an otaku and a NEET!

(Source: HIDIVE)
pt-br:
Para proteger um empresário comum, Tsukasa Atsumi, dos demônios, uma kunoichi genial, Shizuri Ideura, assina um contrato de mestre-servo com ele, com a condição de que ela fique com ele. Apesar de sua aparência descolada de derrotadora de demônios, Shizuri é uma otaku NEET que passa o tempo todo jogando videogame. Enquanto Shizuri é mimada por Tsukasa e leva uma vida preguiçosa de coabitação, as peculiares Kunoichi se reúnem... Uma comédia romântica sobre a convivência com um gênio Kunoichi que é um otaku e um NEET!

(Fonte: HIDIVE)
ja:
平凡なサラリーマン・渥美司を魔物から守るため、天才くノ一・出浦しずりは彼と主従契約を結ぶ。鬼を倒すクールな外見とは裏腹に、しずりはゲームに明け暮れるオタクニート。司に甘やかされ、ダラダラとした同居生活を送るしずりをよそに、一癖も二癖もあるくのいちたちが集まってきて......。オタクでニートの天才くノ一との同居ラブコメディ！

(出典: HIDIVE)

en-us:
A special episode of Kaijuu 8-gou to be released alongside the compilation movie.

A day off… After spending so long training, Reno has forgotten what he’s supposed to do with free time. But when he sees that Hoshina is up to something, he goes on a mission to tail him with Iharu!

(Source: KAIJU NO. 8 EN Twitter)
pt-br:
Um episódio especial de Kaijuu 8-gou a ser lançado juntamente com o filme de compilação.

Um dia de folga... Depois de passar tanto tempo treinando, Reno se esqueceu do que deveria fazer no tempo livre. Mas quando vê que Hoshina está tramando algo, ele parte em uma missão para segui-lo com Iharu!

(Fonte: KAIJU NO. 8 PT Twitter)
ja: 総集編映画と同時公開される『怪獣8号』の特別編。

en-us:
The "Tasokare Hotel" never sees afternoon, nor does it see night, but rather exists in a state of endless twilight.

This hotel exists in a limbo state, as a place that allows souls who have not yet decided if they are meant to pass on to the afterlife, or remain in the world of the living, to rest their wings. The protagonist, Neko Tsukahara, comes across this "Tasokare Hotel" with no memory of who she is or how she came to be there.

An employee leads the way and shows Neko to her room, explaining, "In these rooms, there should be items that are related to our guests' memories. These items can also serve as clues to help our guests remember who they were before they arrived here." As Neko searches for a way to return to this world and remember who she was, a certain incident confronts her...

(Source: "It’s Anime" YouTube Channel)

Note: Each episode streamed 5 days early on some streaming services. The original TV broadcast started on January 8th, 2025.
pt-br:
O "Tasokare Hotel" nunca vê a tarde, nem a noite, mas existe em um estado de crepúsculo sem fim.

Esse hotel existe em um estado de limbo, como um lugar que permite que as almas que ainda não decidiram se devem passar para a vida após a morte ou permanecer no mundo dos vivos descansem suas asas. A protagonista, Neko Tsukahara, se depara com esse "Tasokare Hotel" sem nenhuma lembrança de quem ela é ou de como chegou até ali.

Um funcionário abre caminho e mostra a Neko seu quarto, explicando: "Nesses quartos, deve haver itens relacionados às memórias de nossos hóspedes. Esses itens também podem servir como pistas para ajudar nossos hóspedes a se lembrarem de quem eram antes de chegarem aqui." Enquanto Neko procura uma maneira de voltar a este mundo e se lembrar de quem ela era, um certo incidente a confronta...

(Fonte: Canal do YouTube "It's Anime")

Nota: Cada episódio foi transmitido 5 dias antes em alguns serviços de streaming. A transmissão original da TV começou em 8 de janeiro de 2025.
ja:
「たそかれホテル」は、昼を見ることもなく、夜を見ることもない。 このホテルは、あの世に行くか、この世に留まるかを決めかねている魂が羽を休める場所として、虚無の状態で存在している。主人公の塚原寧子は、自分が誰なのか、どうしてそこにいるのか、まったく覚えていない状態で、この「たそかれホテル」に出くわす。

。 この部屋には、お客様の記憶にまつわるものがあるはずです。この部屋には、お客様の思い出の品があるはずです」と説明する。この世界に戻り、自分を思い出す方法を探す寧子に、ある事件が立ちはだかる...

。 (出典：「アニメだよ」YouTubeチャンネル)

注：一部配信サービスでは、各話5日前倒し配信。また、テレビ放送は2025年1月8日からです。

en-us: An epilogue OVA bundled with the Aldnoah.Zero Blu-ray Disc BOX.
pt-br: Um OVA de epílogo incluído na caixa do disco Blu-ray Aldnoah.Zero.
ja: アルドノア・ゼロ Blu-ray Disc BOXに同梱されたエピローグOVA。

en-us:
For Tamagawa, volunteering at a cat café is the only relief from his stressful job. The manager tells him to, "relax and learn to be spoiled", but he doesn't know what that means until a new customer, Shindo Rai, comes to the café and tells Tamagawa he wants to keep him as a cat! Enter their strange, but fateful relationship. A pure-hearted and soothing romantic comedy.

(Kodansha, translated)
pt-br:
Para Tamagawa, ser voluntário em uma lanchonete para gatos é o único alívio de seu trabalho estressante. O gerente lhe diz para "relaxar e aprender a ser mimado", mas ele não sabe o que isso significa até que um novo cliente, Shindo Rai, chega à lanchonete e diz a Tamagawa que quer mantê-lo como um gato! E assim começa seu estranho, mas fatídico relacionamento. Uma comédia romântica de coração puro e reconfortante.

(Kodansha, traduzido)
ja:
玉川にとって猫カフェのボランティアは、ストレスの多い仕事から解放される唯一の癒しだった。店長から「リラックスして、甘えることを覚えなさい」と言われるが、その意味がわからないまま、新しい客の進藤雷がカフェを訪れ、玉川に「猫として飼いたい」と言う！二人の奇妙で運命的な関係が始まる。純情癒し系ラブコメディ。

（講談社・訳 (講談社・訳）

en-us: Chibi shorts to Kusuriya no Hitorigoto 2nd Season released on the TOHO animation YouTube channel.
pt-br: Curtas chibi para Kusuriya no Hitorigoto 2nd Season lançados no canal de animação da TOHO no YouTube.
ja: TOHOアニメーションのYouTubeチャンネルで公開されたくすり屋のひとりごと 2nd Seasonのチビショート。

en-us:
Pikachu arrives on Monpoké Island. There, the iconic 'mon will meet Dedenne, Ludicolo and many others.

(source: Crunchyroll, edited)
pt-br:
Pikachu chega à Ilha Monpoké. Lá, o icônico 'mon vai conhecer Dedenne, Ludicolo e muitos outros.

(fonte: Crunchyroll, editado)
ja:
ピカチュウがモンポケ島に到着。その島で、ピカチュウはデデンネやルディコロたちと出会う。
(出典：クランチロール、編集部)

en-us: A short directed by loundraw. Made as a collaboration between Z-Kai Group, loundraw, and FLAT STUDIO.
pt-br: Um curta-metragem dirigido por loundraw. Criado em uma colaboração entre o Z-Kai Group, loundraw e FLAT STUDIO.
ja: loundraw監督による短編。Z会グループ、loundraw、FLAT STUDIOのコラボレーション。

en-us: A new episode included as a bonus in the ASOBI STORE special edition Blu-ray box, focusing on the SHHis unit.
pt-br: Um novo episódio incluído como bônus na caixa de Blu-ray da edição especial da ASOBI STORE, com foco na unidade SHHis.
ja: ASOBI STORE特別版Blu-ray BOXの特典として収録された、SHHisユニットに焦点を当てた新エピソード。

en-us:
The second season of Solo Leveling.

Mastering his new abilities in secret, Jin-U must battle humanity's toughest foes to save his mother.

(Source: Crunchyroll News)
ja:
「ソロ・レーベリング」のセカンド・シーズン。 新たな能力を秘密裏に使いこなし、母を救うために人類の強敵と戦わなければならない


ジンU。 (出典：クランチロールニュース）
pt-br:
A segunda temporada de Solo Leveling.

Dominando suas novas habilidades em segredo, Jin-U deve lutar contra os inimigos mais difíceis da humanidade para salvar sua mãe.

(Fonte: Crunchyroll News)
es:
La segunda temporada de Solo Leveling.

Dominando sus nuevas habilidades en secreto, Jin-U debe luchar contra los enemigos más duros de la humanidad para salvar a su madre.

(Fuente: Crunchyroll News)
en:
The second season of Solo Leveling.

Mastering his new abilities in secret, Jin-U must battle humanity's toughest foes to save his mother.

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

en-us:
This is a story about Momo, a high school girl who comes from a family of spirit mediums, and her classmate Okarun, an occult fanatic. After Momo rescues Okarun from being bullied, they begin talking. However, an argument ensues between them since Momo believes in ghosts but denies aliens exist, and Okarun believes in aliens but denies ghosts exist.

To prove to each other what they believe in is real, Momo goes to an abandoned hospital where a UFO has been spotted and Okarun goes to a tunnel rumored to be haunted. To their surprise, they each encounter overwhelming paranormal activities that transcend comprehension. Amid these predicaments, Momo awakens her hidden power and Okarun gains the power of a curse to overcome these new dangers! Their fateful love begins as well!?

The story of the occult battle and adolescence starts!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Notes:
- Worldwide premiere of Episode 1 before the Japanese television premiere occurred at Anime Expo July 6, 2024.
- Episodes 1-3 titled as DAN DA DAN: FIRST ENCOUNTER was pre-screened in advance in theaters on August 31, 2024 in Asia, September 7, 2024 in Europe and September 13, 2024 in North America. The regular TV broadcast began October 4, 2024.
ja:
霊媒師の家系に生まれた女子高生モモと、オカルトマニアの同級生オカルンの物語。いじめられていたおかるんを助けたことをきっかけに、2人は話をするようになる。しかし、ももは幽霊を信じるが宇宙人の存在は否定し、おかるんは宇宙人を信じるが幽霊の存在は否定するため、口論になる。


オカルトバトルと青春の物語が始まる！


注釈：

DAN DA DAN: FIRST ENCOUNTERと題され、アジアでは2024年8月31日、ヨーロッパでは2024年9月7日、北米では2024年9月13日に劇場で先行上映された。通常のテレビ放送は2024年10月4日に開始された。
pt-br:
Esta é uma história sobre Momo, uma garota do ensino médio que vem de uma família de médiuns espíritas, e seu colega de classe Okarun, um fanático por ocultismo. Depois que Momo salva Okarun de ser intimidado, eles começam a conversar. No entanto, surge uma discussão entre elas, já que Momo acredita em fantasmas, mas nega a existência de alienígenas, e Okarun acredita em alienígenas, mas nega a existência de fantasmas.

Para provar um ao outro que aquilo em que acreditam é real, Momo vai a um hospital abandonado onde um OVNI foi visto e Okarun vai a um túnel que dizem ser assombrado. Para sua surpresa, cada um deles se depara com atividades paranormais avassaladoras que transcendem a compreensão. Em meio a essas dificuldades, Momo desperta seu poder oculto e Okarun ganha o poder de uma maldição para superar esses novos perigos! Seu fatídico amor também começa!

A história da batalha oculta e da adolescência começa! (Fonte: Crunchyroll)

Notas:
- A estreia mundial do Episódio 1 antes da estreia na televisão japonesa ocorreu na Anime Expo em 6 de julho de 2024.
- Os episódios 1-3, intitulados DAN DA DAN: FIRST ENCOUNTER, foram pré-estreados com antecedência nos cinemas em 31 de agosto de 2024 na Ásia, 7 de setembro de 2024 na Europa e 13 de setembro de 2024 na América do Norte. A transmissão regular na TV começou em 4 de outubro de 2024.
es:
Esta es una historia sobre Momo, una chica de instituto que procede de una familia de médiums espirituales, y su compañero de clase Okarun, un fanático del ocultismo. Después de que Momo rescata a Okarun del acoso escolar, empiezan a hablar. Sin embargo, se produce una discusión entre ellas ya que Momo cree en los fantasmas pero niega que existan los extraterrestres, y Okarun cree en los extraterrestres pero niega que existan los fantasmas.

Para demostrarse mutuamente que lo que creen es real, Momo va a un hospital abandonado donde se ha visto un ovni y Okarun va a un túnel que se rumorea que está embrujado. Para su sorpresa, cada uno de ellos se encuentra con actividades paranormales sobrecogedoras que van más allá de lo comprensible. En medio de estos aprietos, Momo despierta su poder oculto y Okarun obtiene el poder de una maldición para superar estos nuevos peligros. También comienza su fatídico amor.

Comienza la historia de la batalla oculta y la adolescencia!

(Fuente: Crunchyroll)

Notas:
- Estreno mundial del Episodio 1 antes del estreno en la televisión japonesa que tuvo lugar en la Anime Expo el 6 de julio de 2024.
- Los episodios 1-3 titulados como DAN DA DAN: PRIMER ENCUENTRO se preestrenaron por adelantado en cines el 31 de agosto de 2024 en Asia, el 7 de septiembre de 2024 en Europa y el 13 de septiembre de 2024 en Norteamérica. La emisión regular en televisión comenzó el 4 de octubre de 2024.
en:
This is a story about Momo, a high school girl who comes from a family of spirit mediums, and her classmate Okarun, an occult fanatic. After Momo rescues Okarun from being bullied, they begin talking. However, an argument ensues between them since Momo believes in ghosts but denies aliens exist, and Okarun believes in aliens but denies ghosts exist.

To prove to each other what they believe in is real, Momo goes to an abandoned hospital where a UFO has been spotted and Okarun goes to a tunnel rumored to be haunted. To their surprise, they each encounter overwhelming paranormal activities that transcend comprehension. Amid these predicaments, Momo awakens her hidden power and Okarun gains the power of a curse to overcome these new dangers! Their fateful love begins as well!?

The story of the occult battle and adolescence starts!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Notes:
- Worldwide premiere of Episode 1 before the Japanese television premiere occurred at Anime Expo July 6, 2024.
- Episodes 1-3 titled as DAN DA DAN: FIRST ENCOUNTER was pre-screened in advance in theaters on August 31, 2024 in Asia, September 7, 2024 in Europe and September 13, 2024 in North America. The regular TV broadcast began October 4, 2024.

en-us:
The second season of Dandadan.

Okarun and Jiji have made a strange discovery, while Momo finds herself under attack! What mysterious encounters await them next?!

(Source: Netflix Anime Twitter)
ja: オカルンとジジは奇妙な発見をし、モモは襲われていた！次はどんな不思議な出会いが待っているのか！？ (出典：Netflixアニメツイッター)
pt-br:
A segunda temporada de Dandadan.

Okarun e Jiji fizeram uma estranha descoberta, enquanto Momo se vê sob ataque! Que encontros misteriosos os aguardam a seguir? (Fonte: Netflix Anime Twitter)
es:
La segunda temporada de Dandadan.

¡Okarun y Jiji han hecho un extraño descubrimiento, mientras que Momo se encuentra bajo ataque! ¿Qué misteriosos encuentros les esperan a continuación? (Fuente: Netflix Anime Twitter)
en:
The second season of Dandadan.

Okarun and Jiji have made a strange discovery, while Momo finds herself under attack! What mysterious encounters await them next?!

(Source: Netflix Anime Twitter)

en-us:
Amate Yuzuriha is a high-school student living peacefully in a space colony floating in outer space.

When she meets a war refugee named Nyaan, Amate is drawn into the illegal mobile suit dueling sport known as Clan Battle.

Under the entry name "Machu," she throws herself into fierce battle day after day, piloting the GQuuuuuuX. Then an unidentified Gundam mobile suit pursued by both the space force and the police appears before her, along with its pilot, a boy named Shuji.

Now their world is about to enter a new era.

(Source: Official Site)

Note: Prior to broadcasting, "Mobile Suit Gundam GQuuuuuuX -Beginning-" — a theatrical pre-screening of the first 3 episodes edited together— debuted in Japan on January 17, 2025 and in North America on February 28, 2025.
ja:
アマテ・ユズリハは、宇宙に浮かぶスペースコロニーで平和に暮らす高校生。

戦争難民のニャアンと出会い、非合法なモビルスーツ決闘スポーツ「クランバトル」にのめり込んでいく。 戦争難民のニャアンと出会ったことで、アマテは非合法なモビルスーツ決闘スポーツ「クランバトル」にのめり込んでいく。

。 マッハ」というエントリーネームでGQuuuuXを操り、日々激戦に身を投じていた。そんな彼女の前に、宇宙軍からも警察からも追われる正体不明のガンダムモビルスーツと、そのパイロットである少年・シュウジが現れる。 今、彼らの世界は新たな時代を迎えようとしていた...

。 (出典：公式サイト）

注：放送に先立ち、再編集したエピソードを使用した劇場版『機動戦士ガンダム GQuuuuX -Beginning-』が、日本では2025年1月17日、北米では2025年2月28日に公開予定。
es:
Amate Yuzuriha es una estudiante de instituto que vive pacíficamente en una colonia espacial que flota en el espacio exterior.

Cuando conoce a un refugiado de guerra llamado Nyaan, Amate se ve arrastrada al deporte ilegal de duelos de trajes móviles conocido como Batalla de Clanes.

Bajo el nombre de entrada "Machu", se lanza a la feroz batalla día tras día, pilotando el GQuuuuuuX. Entonces aparece ante ella un traje móvil Gundam no identificado perseguido tanto por la fuerza espacial como por la policía, junto con su piloto, un chico llamado Shuji.

Ahora su mundo está a punto de entrar en una nueva era.

(Fuente: Página oficial)

Nota: Antes de su emisión, "Mobile Suit Gundam GQuuuuuuX -Beginning-" -una versión teatral que utiliza episodios reeditados- tiene previsto su estreno en Japón el 17 de enero de 2025 y en Norteamérica el 28 de febrero de 2025.
pt-br:
Amate Yuzuriha é uma estudante do ensino médio que vive pacificamente em uma colônia espacial que flutua no espaço sideral.

Quando conhece um refugiado de guerra chamado Nyaan, Amate é atraída para o esporte ilegal de duelo de trajes móveis conhecido como Clan Battle.

Sob o nome de registro "Machu", ela se lança em uma batalha feroz dia após dia, pilotando o GQuuuuuuX. Então, um traje móvel Gundam não identificado, perseguido tanto pela força espacial quanto pela polícia, aparece diante dela, juntamente com seu piloto, um garoto chamado Shuji.

Agora, o mundo deles está prestes a entrar em uma nova era.

(Fonte: Site Oficial)

Nota: Antes da transmissão, "Mobile Suit Gundam GQuuuuuuX -Beginning-" - uma pré-exibição teatral dos 3 primeiros episódios editados juntos - estreou no Japão em 17 de janeiro de 2025 e na América do Norte em 28 de fevereiro de 2025.

en-us:
A cat-like alien from a distant galaxy, MuMu, arrives on Earth. His goal is to learn about home appliance technology on Earth to recover the technology his species has lost. The protagonist, Sakurako, has a typical university life, but everything changes with MuMu's arrival! What begins as an unexpected cohabitation quickly turns into a whirlwind of chaotic events. The chemistry between Sakurako and MuMu leads to a super-spectacular, appliance-filled, and cat comedy adventure.

(Source: Pony Canyon)
ja: 種族が失った技術を取り戻すためにやってきた宇宙人ムム。平凡な大学生の日常は、彼の登場によって崩壊していく......？猫が地球を揺るがす！壮大なロマン!
es: Un alienígena, Mumu, que vino a recuperar la tecnología perdida por su raza. La vida cotidiana de un estudiante universitario corriente se derrumba por su llegada... ¡Un gato sacude la tierra! ¡¡Espectacular romance!!
pt-br:
Um alienígena parecido com um gato de uma galáxia distante, MuMu, chega à Terra. Seu objetivo é aprender sobre a tecnologia de eletrodomésticos na Terra para recuperar a tecnologia que sua espécie perdeu. A protagonista, Sakurako, tem uma vida universitária típica, mas tudo muda com a chegada de MuMu! O que começa como uma convivência inesperada rapidamente se transforma em um turbilhão de eventos caóticos. A química entre Sakurako e MuMu leva a uma aventura de comédia superespetacular, cheia de aparelhos e gatos.

(Fonte: Pony Canyon)

en-us:
Ever wonder what the members of the Defense Force do when not battling giant monsters? Well, wonder no more!
This mini-anime focuses on the carefree daily lives of Kafka Hibino and the other members of the Defense Force.
ja:
巨大怪獣と戦っていないとき、防衛軍のメンバーは何をしているのだろう？もう不思議に思うことはない！
このミニアニメは、カフカ・ヒビノをはじめとする防衛軍メンバーの気ままな日常を描いている。
pt-br:
Você já se perguntou o que os membros da Força de Defesa fazem quando não estão lutando contra monstros gigantes? Bem, não se pergunte mais!
Esse mini-anime se concentra na vida cotidiana despreocupada de Kafka Hibino e dos outros membros da Força de Defesa.
es:
¿Alguna vez te has preguntado qué hacen los miembros de las Fuerzas de Defensa cuando no están luchando contra monstruos gigantes? Pues no te lo preguntes más.
Este mini-anime se centra en la despreocupada vida cotidiana de Kafka Hibino y los demás miembros de la Fuerza de Defensa.
en:
Ever wonder what the members of the Defense Force do when not battling giant monsters? Well, wonder no more!
This mini-anime focuses on the carefree daily lives of Kafka Hibino and the other members of the Defense Force.

en-us:
"In a world where words mean power, they risk all that they stand for".

The final Division Rap Battle begins. 48 different patterns, 16 new songs and 7 possible endings.

This film will be Japan's first-ever interactive movie, where the audience's choices will change the development and outcome of each screening. The story unfolds differently based on the audience’s decisions, offering an entirely new participatory cinematic experience.

(Source: Hypnosis Mic Youtube Channel, edited)
en:
"In a world where words mean power, they risk all that they stand for".

The final Division Rap Battle begins. 48 different patterns, 16 new songs and 7 possible endings.

This film will be Japan's first-ever interactive movie, where the audience's choices will change the development and outcome of each screening. The story unfolds differently based on the audience’s decisions, offering an entirely new participatory cinematic experience.

(Source: Hypnosis Mic Youtube Channel, edited)
pt-br:
"Em um mundo onde as palavras significam poder, eles arriscam tudo o que representam".

A Batalha de Rap da Divisão final começa. 48 padrões diferentes, 16 novas músicas e 7 finais possíveis.

Este filme será o primeiro filme interativo do Japão, onde as escolhas do público mudarão o desenvolvimento e o resultado de cada exibição. A história se desenrola de forma diferente com base nas decisões do público, oferecendo uma experiência cinematográfica participativa totalmente nova.

(Fonte: Canal do Youtube do Hypnosis Mic, editado)

en-us:
On February 28, ONE PIECE took over Crypto.com Arena for a special game night collab event with the Los Angeles Lakers. The Lakers ended up taking down their opponents in a close 106-102 game, and maybe some of that juice is thanks to the presence of the Straw Hats and a special piece of animation created for the event.

The anime short—which depicts a Lakers uniform-clad Luffy in an intense basketball match against a team of Marines—can be seen in all its 30 seconds of glory. Can our captain Luffy take home the win?

(Source: Crunchyroll News, ONE PIECE Official ENG YouTube description, edited)
en:
On February 28, ONE PIECE took over Crypto.com Arena for a special game night collab event with the Los Angeles Lakers. The Lakers ended up taking down their opponents in a close 106-102 game, and maybe some of that juice is thanks to the presence of the Straw Hats and a special piece of animation created for the event.

The anime short—which depicts a Lakers uniform-clad Luffy in an intense basketball match against a team of Marines—can be seen in all its 30 seconds of glory. Can our captain Luffy take home the win?

(Source: Crunchyroll News, ONE PIECE Official ENG YouTube description, edited)
pt-br:
Em 28 de fevereiro, a ONE PIECE invadiu a Crypto.com Arena para um evento especial de colaboração com o Los Angeles Lakers. Os Lakers acabaram derrotando seus oponentes em um jogo apertado por 106 a 102, e talvez parte desse sucesso se deva à presença dos Straw Hats e a uma animação especial criada para o evento.

O curta do anime - que mostra Luffy vestido com o uniforme do Lakers em uma intensa partida de basquete contra uma equipe de fuzileiros navais - pode ser visto em todos os seus 30 segundos de glória. Poderá o nosso capitão Luffy levar para casa a vitória?

(Fonte: Crunchyroll News, ONE PIECE Official ENG YouTube description, editado)

en-us: Kazuhiko Nukumizu is a high school boy content to blend in with the background mob, until he witnessed his more popular classmate Anna Yanami get dumped by her childhood friend. He felt like he had to try to comfort Yanami, but this led him to become entangled with other girls who have met defeat at love?
en: Kazuhiko Nukumizu is a high school boy content to blend in with the background mob, until he witnessed his more popular classmate Anna Yanami get dumped by her childhood friend. He felt like he had to try to comfort Yanami, but this led him to become entangled with other girls who have met defeat at love?

en-us: In a world where dragons rule the skies, mankind still dreams of flight, of someday dominating the heavens in their stead. Even in times of war, the passionate young pilot Karl Schuniz continues to chase his dreams, taking up his wings of steel - the revolutionary new aircraft, the Blitz Vogel - to challenge the Kaiser Drache, the fastest dragon that can fly at supersonic speeds.
en: In a world where dragons rule the skies, mankind still dreams of flight, of someday dominating the heavens in their stead. Even in times of war, the passionate young pilot Karl Schuniz continues to chase his dreams, taking up his wings of steel - the revolutionary new aircraft, the Blitz Vogel - to challenge the Kaiser Drache, the fastest dragon that can fly at supersonic speeds.

en-us:
In this sequel to Batman Ninja, the Batman family has returned to the present to discover that Japan has disappeared, and a giant island - Hinomoto - is now in the sky over Gotham City. At the top sit the Yakuza, a group of superpowered individuals who reign without honor or humanity and look suspiciously like the Justice League. Now, it’s up to Batman and his allies to save Gotham!

(Source: Amazon Prime Video)

Note: Release date reflect the release in Japan, it was release in the US on March 18, 2025.

No topo da ilha está a Yakuza, um grupo de indivíduos superpoderosos que reinam sem honra ou humanidade e são suspeitosamente parecidos com a Liga da Justiça. Agora, cabe ao Batman e seus aliados salvar Gotham!

(Fonte: Amazon Prime Video)

Nota: A data de lançamento reflete o lançamento no Japão, foi lançado nos EUA em 18 de março de 2025.

en-us:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He's got an air of mystery about him, great style, and an impeccable music taste. Little does she know—this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki! Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya's, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other's crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question for Mitsuki—but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn't be so bad...

(Source: Yen Press)

Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He's got an air of mystery about him, great style, and an impeccable music taste. Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya's, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other's crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question for Mitsuki—but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn't be so bad...

(Source: Yen Press)

en-us:
The main topic of conversation between high school girls Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani is always Kirio, a boy in the same class. This one-way romantic comedy depicts the daily lives of these two friends and rivals, which never seems to have reached the point of love yet.

(Source: Ruelle Comics, translated)

The main topic of conversation between high school girls Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani is always Kirio, a boy in the same class. This one-way romantic comedy depicts the daily lives of these two friends and rivals, which never seems to have reached the point of love yet.

en-us:
Hino Kahoko is a student whose school is divided into two branches - the Normal Branch, in which students wear grey uniforms, and the Music Branch, in which the students wear white. The school's tradition is a music competition, but it it more common that students from the Music Branch are chosen to compete. Kahoko is surprised one day to encounter a fairy named Lili. Solely because she is the only student to see him, she is the only student from the Normal Branch to be in the competition.

Kahoko doesn't have any musical knowledge, until Lili grants her a magic violin, one that anyone can play if they believe they can truly do it. Kahoko must now face the trials of the competition, her competitors, and her peers.
en:
Hino Kahoko is a student whose school is divided into two branches - the Normal Branch, in which students wear grey uniforms, and the Music Branch, in which the students wear white. The school's tradition is a music competition, but it it more common that students from the Music Branch are chosen to compete. Kahoko is surprised one day to encounter a fairy named Lili. Solely because she is the only student to see him, she is the only student from the Normal Branch to be in the competition.

Kahoko doesn't have any musical knowledge, until Lili grants her a magic violin, one that anyone can play if they believe they can truly do it. Kahoko must now face the trials of the competition, her competitors, and her peers.

en-us: A musical movie about a tiny village with tiny people. A tiny child fed a starving caterpillar his last rice cake. There was a race held soon after to determine who the king will be. The caterpillar had become a butterfly and as a thank you, pulled the tiny child's race car.

en-us: Murasame Sumika is popular in the high school for her excellence in the marks and sports. However, she has a secret: she is in love with her classmate Kazama Ushio. Ushio also has a liking to the love between girls, but she hasn't noticed Sumika's feeling and always been refused by other girls.
en: Murasame Sumika is popular in the high school for her excellence in the marks and sports. However, she has a secret: she is in love with her classmate Kazama Ushio. Ushio also has a liking to the love between girls, but she hasn't noticed Sumika's feeling and always been refused by other girls.

en-us:
The story begins with Oomiya Shinobu, a 15-year-old, seemingly pure Japanese girl who actually did a homestay in Great Britain. Even after coming back to Japan, she still misses her time overseas. One day, an airmail letter arrives from Alice, the girl in Shinobu's host family in Great Britain. The letter reads: Shinobu, I'm coming to Japan! The Japanese/British girls' mixed comedy follows the lives of Shinobu, Alice, and other girls from both Japan and Great Britain.

(Source: Anime News Network)
en:
The story begins with Oomiya Shinobu, a 15-year-old, seemingly pure Japanese girl who actually did a homestay in Great Britain. Even after coming back to Japan, she still misses her time overseas. One day, an airmail letter arrives from Alice, the girl in Shinobu's host family in Great Britain. The letter reads: Shinobu, I'm coming to Japan! The Japanese/British girls' mixed comedy follows the lives of Shinobu, Alice, and other girls from both Japan and Great Britain.

(Source: Anime News Network)

en-us:
A small group of adults have been invited to a reunion at their old highschool to remember the loss of their classmate Kiriko, after receiving a letter "From K."

Not knowing who "K" is, Ryosuke, a young man with short black hair that used to know Kiriko, has to uncover the truth of Kiriko's mysterious death. As he slowly regains his memories as his fellow classmates start suddenly dying around him in the most horrific manner, he realises that it's far too late to say sorry.

en-us:
Yuuji Kitano, a college athlete newly graduated from his university, got a job in a big sports equipment corporation. He soon finds out that he is surrounded by numerous obstacles: gets involved in corporation politics of high level executives; lacks of trust from capable female coworkers; being rotated, promoted, and demoted all around; last but not least, a tough HR manager who's also his landlord. However, no matter how difficult the situation is, he is always optimistic and diligent, and his positive attitude not only motivates people around him but also touches the hearts of his female colleagues.

(Source: Anime News Network)

en-us:
A manga adaptation of Key's ninth visual novel.

The main part of Rewrite's story takes place in the fictional city of Kazamatsuri in Japan, where tree planting and afforestation have caused the city to become overgrown with trees and vegetation. The protagonist Kotarou and his friends in the occult research society attend a high school in Kazamatsuri, and the characters also spend time in the society's clubroom. Outside of the school, frequented locations include the forests of Kazamatsuri and Kotarou's house. Throughout the story, Kotarou encounters an alternate dimension of Kazamatsuri where everything is silent and the sky is gray.

(Source: Wikipedia)
en:
A manga adaptation of Key's ninth visual novel.

The main part of Rewrite's story takes place in the fictional city of Kazamatsuri in Japan, where tree planting and afforestation have caused the city to become overgrown with trees and vegetation. The protagonist Kotarou and his friends in the occult research society attend a high school in Kazamatsuri, and the characters also spend time in the society's clubroom. Outside of the school, frequented locations include the forests of Kazamatsuri and Kotarou's house. Throughout the story, Kotarou encounters an alternate dimension of Kazamatsuri where everything is silent and the sky is gray.

(Source: Wikipedia)

en-us:
Detective Akira Yusa sees his brother Shinichi killed before his very eyes. He spots a young girl, Kilico Sakaki, at the scene of the crime and instinctively knows that she did it. After a bloody fight, Akira arrests her. Trained as a professional assassin by her stepfather, Toshio Sakaki, in everyday life, Kilico acts like an ordinary college student. Her arrest is treated as a mistake when she manages to hide all evidence of Shinichi's murder. Akira's subsequent investigation of Kilico runs into difficulty when he finds that it's too big for a police detective to handle. Her encounter with Akira makes Kilico remember her terrible past and have doubts about being an assassin. Kilico goes to Taiwan to train as a jewel connoisseur, the Sakaki family's legitimate business, behind which they hide all their illegitimate business. Fired for taking his investigation too far, Akira follows Kilico to Taiwan. The two meet again and become very close, as they get involved in the internal conflicts within the Tenrenban gang, Taiwan's biggest Mafia group.

(Source: Kotonoha)
en:
Detective Akira Yusa sees his brother Shinichi killed before his very eyes. He spots a young girl, Kilico Sakaki, at the scene of the crime and instinctively knows that she did it. After a bloody fight, Akira arrests her. Trained as a professional assassin by her stepfather, Toshio Sakaki, in everyday life, Kilico acts like an ordinary college student. Her arrest is treated as a mistake when she manages to hide all evidence of Shinichi's murder. Akira's subsequent investigation of Kilico runs into difficulty when he finds that it's too big for a police detective to handle. Her encounter with Akira makes Kilico remember her terrible past and have doubts about being an assassin. Kilico goes to Taiwan to train as a jewel connoisseur, the Sakaki family's legitimate business, behind which they hide all their illegitimate business. Fired for taking his investigation too far, Akira follows Kilico to Taiwan. The two meet again and become very close, as they get involved in the internal conflicts within the Tenrenban gang, Taiwan's biggest Mafia group.

(Source: Kotonoha)

en-us:
Matthias, a child abused continuously by his mother, having committed her murder finds refuge in a church where he meets a seemingly helpful, young priest and Hans, a fellow resident. Not much time passes however, until Matthias realizes there's something suspicious going on behind the facade of peaceful shelter...
(from Aarinfantasy)

en-us: An office lady tired of her daily life gets into a cab that takes her to an unexpected place...
en: An office lady tired of her daily life gets into a cab that takes her to an unexpected place...

en-us: Meet Minami Sakura, a girl who’s just started the life she’s always dreamed of with her new job in Tokyo. But it turns out that company’s clean image also has a dark underside… which bewilders Minami and causes her to struggle. And when one of the employees is found murdered, everything goes to hell. This is just the beginning of Kiriko’s party!
en: Meet Minami Sakura, a girl who’s just started the life she’s always dreamed of with her new job in Tokyo. But it turns out that company’s clean image also has a dark underside… which bewilders Minami and causes her to struggle. And when one of the employees is found murdered, everything goes to hell. This is just the beginning of Kiriko’s party!

en-us:
Two doctors, the young, passionate and well-liked Osanai and the veteran, ambitious Tatsugaura, are both investigating the mysterious 'Monmow' disease, found only in one remote village, which causes bizarre bone deformation, making its victims take on a beastlike appearance before their deaths.

Osanai is sent to the village by Tatsugaura to see if he can find a cause for the disease while also treating the victims to the best of his ability. But in reality, Tatsugaura is scheming against Osanai and intends to infect him with the disease in order to clear the way of any obstacles of presenting his own research, and thus gaining high prestige and rank in the medical world.
en:
Two doctors, the young, passionate and well-liked Osanai and the veteran, ambitious Tatsugaura, are both investigating the mysterious 'Monmow' disease, found only in one remote village, which causes bizarre bone deformation, making its victims take on a beastlike appearance before their deaths.

Osanai is sent to the village by Tatsugaura to see if he can find a cause for the disease while also treating the victims to the best of his ability. But in reality, Tatsugaura is scheming against Osanai and intends to infect him with the disease in order to clear the way of any obstacles of presenting his own research, and thus gaining high prestige and rank in the medical world.

en-us:
There are huge monsters wreaking havoc in Mikagura Kiriwo's city. Building on his father's work, Kiriwo has created a serum that turns him into a giant monster for a short time. He uses this serum to help protect the town from a monster one day--only to find that everyone thinks he's an enemy, too! Everyone at school and in the media hates the "black monster" that he became, due to the massive destruction he did to the town around him. A girl from his class even has to quit school, due to problems caused by the "black monster." Will Kiriwo be able to show that his monster form is really intended to be a savior?

(Source: MangaHelpers)

(Source: Ruelle Comics, translated)

en-us: These thoughts are hotter than flame, and deeper than the fallen snow. “I love Ichikawa-chan”. As his body burned at the other’s touch, the confession slipped out. Natsuki’s thoughts were always dwelling on his art teacher, Ichikawa. When he learned of Ichikawa’s sudden retirement, he tried to prevent it, but… From the art room tinted by their memories, their passionate sighs begin to fall. (Source: Attractive Fascinante)

Orchestrated by genius scientist Akihiko Kayaba, the SAO Incident created a game you couldn't leave until you beat it. One where death in the game meant death in the real world... But Kirito soon finds himself caught up in a mysterious game he never expected...

en-us:
Film commemorating the 30th anniversary of the Kaiketsu Zorori children's book series.

Zorori makes an alarm clock machine to wake up in time for free donuts. But something strange happens when Zorori reminisces about his mother and sheds a tear. They see scenes flash by and the ZZ mark on his costume disappears! Zorori treasures it incredibly as it was added by his mother although he doesn't know its meaning.

After crash landing in the street, Zorori, Ishishi, and Noshishi are saved by a fashion design student who they quickly discover is Zororene, Zorori's mother. The alarm clock machine had become a time machine and sent them to the past. She and later Zorondo Ron (Zorori's father), help the trio take back their time machine from the police and a kaijuu.

After crash landing in the street, Zorori, Ishishi, and Noshishi are saved by a fashion design student who they quickly discover is Zororene, Zorori's mother. The alarm clock machine had become a time machine and sent them to the past. She and later Zorondo Ron (Zorori's father), help the trio take back their time machine from the police and a kaijuu.

en-us:
It is the Taisho Period in Japan. Tanjiro, a kindhearted boy who sells charcoal for a living, finds his family slaughtered by a demon. To make matters worse, his younger sister Nezuko, the sole survivor, has been transformed into a demon herself. Though devastated by this grim reality, Tanjiro resolves to become a “demon slayer” so that he can turn his sister back into a human, and kill the demon that massacred his family.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

en-us:
After visiting the Rengoku residence, Tanjirou and his comrades volunteer for a mission within the Entertainment District, a place where desires are sold and demons dwell. They journey alongside the flashy Sound Hashira, Tengen Uzui, in search of a monstrous foe terrorizing the town. Sworn to slay creatures of the night, the hunt continues.

(Source: Funimation)

Note:
- The first episode aired with a runtime of ~47 minutes.
- The last episode aired with a runtime of ~33 minutes.

en-us:
This animated documentary is derived from footage shot at the site of the Sanrizuka struggle opposing the construction of Narita Airport. In addition to scenes evidently shot before and after the Nihon Genyasai Festival in Sanrizuka, it features time-lapse sequences showing abandoned houses and construction equipment leveling requisitioned land.

(Source: Collaborative Cataloging Japan)
en:
This animated documentary is derived from footage shot at the site of the Sanrizuka struggle opposing the construction of Narita Airport. In addition to scenes evidently shot before and after the Nihon Genyasai Festival in Sanrizuka, it features time-lapse sequences showing abandoned houses and construction equipment leveling requisitioned land.

(Source: Collaborative Cataloging Japan)

en-us:
In Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Mugen Train Arc, Tanjiro Kamado and his fellow Demon Slayer members embark on a mission aboard the Infinity Train. Their new mission is to investigate a series of mysterious disappearances, carried out by a demon that has been terrorizing passengers and killing the demon slayers who oppose it.

Note: The first episode is entirely anime original. Episodes 2-7 are a re-edited version of the movie featuring new scenes and music.

Note: The first episode is entirely anime original. Episodes 2-7 are a re-edited version of the movie featuring new scenes and music.

en-us:
Adaptation of the Hashira Training Arc.

The Hashira, the Demon Slayer Corps' highest ranking swordsmen and members. The Hashira Training has begun in order to face the forthcoming battle against Muzan Kibutsuji. Each with their own thoughts and hopes held in their hearts, a new story for Tanjiro and the Hashira begins.

(Source: Aniplex USA)

Note: The first episode received an early premiere in cinemas as part of a special screening alongside the final episode of Kimetsu no Yaiba: Katanakaji no Sato-hen.

en-us:
Adaptation of the Swordsmith Village Arc.

Tanjiro’s journey leads him to the Swordsmith Village, where he reunites with two Hashira, members of the Demon Slayer Corps’ highest-ranking swordsmen - Mist Hashira Muichiro Tokito and Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji. With the shadows of demons lurking near, a new battle begins for Tanjiro and his comrades.

Notes:
• The first episode has a runtime of ~49 minutes, and received an early premiere in cinemas worldwide as part of a special screening alongside the final two episodes of Kimetsu no Yaiba: Yuukaku-hen.
• The final episode has a runtime of ~52 minutes.

en-us:
The scene is Steam City, a London-ish city which represents an entire civilization run by coal and steam power. Because of steam, the city is sometimes covered in a mist. Villains take advantage of the steamy mist to hide and execute their evil plans. Only a few dare venture into what's beyond the steamy mist. They are known as the Steam Detectives: Narutaki (and his convertible all-purpose pistol), his nurse-assistant Lingling, and his Megamaton robot Gohliki.

(Source: Anime News Network)

en-us:
Nagasawa Shiina is just an average 3rd year high school student until her parents' company goes bankrupt. In order to pay the bills, she sells herself into prostitution. At her first job, a mysterious masked man crashes the party... and it's someone she knows.

Akumetsu is the story of Shou, a vigilante that's out trying to straighten the corrupt Japanese Government through terrorism with his "One man, One kill" code of action.

en-us:
This mildly innocent oneshot depicts the story of 2 different high-school girls as they crash into each other at the school’s corridor; the result and the afterword of each other’s relationship with their fated ones as it takes a turn from the bed of the infirmary which they woke up from…

*Also includes three other stories:

• Baribari Lovers!!! -
A bittersweet high-school story depicting the follow-up between a cute but naive girl and a bad-boy delinquent who tramples with her innocent heart. You sway along with the main female--even when her heart breaks... You may have a undying urge to punch that gangster.

• Koimitsu

• 2U

en-us:
Akira, over the years, has developed feelings for his unobtainable childhood friend, Tadaoki. Because of his unrequited love and burning passion for his friend, Akira is always in a constant state of fever. As if that wasn’t troublesome enough, Akira is also receiving advances from his boss, Shima, who is older. How far will Akira’s love for Tadaoki go? Can he stay strong or, will he find himself in the merciful arms of Shima as a deciding act of surrender?

Tadaoki has always seen Akira as his responsibility, and as a result, is very protective of him. He is totally unaware of Akira’s fever state, and not once, has he ever considered just how much Akira really means to him. That is, until Shima threatens the very balance of his and Akira’s friendship. Will Tadaoki rise up to the occasion before it’s late? Or, will he allow another man to take his most coveted place within Akira’s heart forever?

(Source: DMG)

But what was the reason that stranger agreed so easily? and how would he react when his one night stand would come to his work place to look for him the morning after?

Included one-shots:

en-us:
Giyu heads north to an area where a band of hunters was killed. He and the Insect Hashira meet Yae, the daughter of a slain hunter, who believes a bear killed her father, but the truth is harder to face. Kyojuro also receives his newest assignment and hopes completing it will prove he’s worthy of the title Flame Hashira, which his father abandoned. An explosive battle unfolds as Kyojuro takes on a demon of the Twelve Kizuki who holds a grudge against Kyojuro’s father.

(Source: Viz Media)

Note: the chapter count is 30 because it includes Kimetsu no Aima, which was originally 26 chapters.

en-us:
The setting is Taisho era Japan. Tanjirou is a kindhearted young boy who lived peacefully with his family as a coal seller. Their normal life changes completely when his family is slaughtered by demons. The only other survivor, Tanjirou's younger sister Nezuko, has become a ferocious demon. In order to return Nezuko to normal and get revenge on the demon that killed their family, the two of them depart on a journey. From a young talent, an adventure tale of blood and swords begins!

(Source: Shonen Jump)

Notes:
- Includes 2 extra chapters.
- Nominated to the 24th and 25th Annual Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize.
en:
The setting is Taisho era Japan. Tanjirou is a kindhearted young boy who lived peacefully with his family as a coal seller. Their normal life changes completely when his family is slaughtered by demons. The only other survivor, Tanjirou's younger sister Nezuko, has become a ferocious demon. In order to return Nezuko to normal and get revenge on the demon that killed their family, the two of them depart on a journey. From a young talent, an adventure tale of blood and swords begins!

(Source: Shonen Jump)

Notes:
- Includes 2 extra chapters.
- Nominated to the 24th and 25th Annual Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize.

en-us:
Zenitsu is late for class, and the only thing between him and Giyu’s bamboo sword is one good excuse. Next, when Inosuke, Murata, and Zenitsu fail their midterm, they must endure the harshest math lesson of their lives. Then there’s Uzui’s explosive art class, Nezuko’s first cavity, and Rengoku’s forbidden pizza!

(Source: VIZ)

Note: Chapter count includes six volume-bonus chapters.

en-us: "Rengoku Volume 0" was distributed to all Kimetsu no Yaiba: Infinity Train Movie attendants. It has a new fully drawn story by Koyoharu Gotouge that depicts the first mission of Kyoujurou Rengoku.
en: "Rengoku Volume 0" was distributed to all Kimetsu no Yaiba: Infinity Train Movie attendants. It has a new fully drawn story by Koyoharu Gotouge that depicts the first mission of Kyoujurou Rengoku.

en-us:
The first light novel written by Aya Yajima for Kimetsu no Yaiba containing five chapters, as well as an afterword.

1. Shiawase no Hana
Takes place after the Drum House arc and centers around Tanjiro, Zenitsu, and Inosuke bonding while attending a village wedding.
2. Dare ga Tame ni
Takes place after the Natagumo Mountain arc during a "date" between Zenitsu and Nezuko. Zenitsu begins to reminisce about his past encounter with a woman named Sayuri.
3. Uranai Sōdō Tenmatsuki
Takes place after the Infinity Train arc. Shinobu attempts to cheer the Kamaboko trio up by sending them to buy sweets. On the way back to the Butterfly Mansion, the trio encounter a fortune teller.
4. Aoi to Kanao
Shinobu sends Kanao to accompany Aoi on a trip to the apothecary.
5. Chūkōikan ☆ Kimetsu Gakuen Monokatari
Modern-day school alternate universe where Zenitsu has had enough of the Morals Committee and begs his friends to help him quit the club. A seemingly easy task becomes complicated when all of the teachers turn out to be unreliable.

en-us:
The second light novel written by Aya Yajima for Kimetsu no Yaiba containing six stories.

1. Katahane no Chō
The story of how the Kouchou sisters ended up becoming Demon Slayers.
2. Tadashii Onsen no Susume
Uzui motivates Zenitsu to complete his training by offering him the chance to join a mixed-gender bath. Excited, Zenitsu agrees, roping in Inosuke to help him finish the task.
3. Kanroji Mitsuri no Kakushigoto
Mitsuri begins to feel troubled after learning about the reason why Shinobu joined the Demon Slayer Corps. Feeling selfish, she begins to avoid the other Hashiras. Obanai and Shinobu, not knowing what's wrong, brainstorm ways to cheer her up.
4. Yume no Atosaki
Genya enjoys a quiet day in the Butterfly estate amidst thoughts of his older brother.
5. Warawanai Kimihe
The pillars get together to make Tomioka laugh.
6. Chūkōikan ☆ Kimetsu Gakuen Monokatari ~ Paradaisu・Rosuto
A cute short about the Kimetsu no Yaiba cast as modern-day students preparing for the upcoming school festival.

en-us:
The great snow-covered kingdom of Bistron, legend has it that an evil witch lives in the Black Forest at the edge of the kingdom… That very witch, Veronica finds herself summoned by the ruler of Bistron through his messenger of noble blood, Ignatius.

(Source: AOC Translations)
en:
The great snow-covered kingdom of Bistron, legend has it that an evil witch lives in the Black Forest at the edge of the kingdom… That very witch, Veronica finds herself summoned by the ruler of Bistron through his messenger of noble blood, Ignatius.

(Source: AOC Translations)

en-us: None.
en: None.

en-us:
Misora Kanata is a first-year student on the Takanosaki High School cheerleading team. She won a national championship in middle school, but can’t jump after a mistake in a competition. She befriends Suzuha, Shion, Anna, Nodoka, and Megumi to form the PoMPoMs. Their new team goes beyond cheerleading to reach the hearts of the people they cheer on. They might just change the world!

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)
en:
Misora Kanata is a first-year student on the Takanosaki High School cheerleading team. She won a national championship in middle school, but can’t jump after a mistake in a competition. She befriends Suzuha, Shion, Anna, Nodoka, and Megumi to form the PoMPoMs. Their new team goes beyond cheerleading to reach the hearts of the people they cheer on. They might just change the world!

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

en-us:
1887, at a remote, elite boarding school in France: Serge Battour returns after his graduation, and remembers the days of his youth...

1880, at the same school: Son of a viscount and a Roma prostitute (both deceased), Serge is intelligent, sweet, talented, and alienated by his family due to his heritage. Upon being sent to his new school, he rooms with Gilbert Cocteau, a gorgeous loner of a boy who sells his body for reasons unknown. Serge's attempts to reach out to Gilbert fail spectacularly, and yet there is something in both of them that attracts them to each other.
en:
1887, at a remote, elite boarding school in France: Serge Battour returns after his graduation, and remembers the days of his youth...

1880, at the same school: Son of a viscount and a Roma prostitute (both deceased), Serge is intelligent, sweet, talented, and alienated by his family due to his heritage. Upon being sent to his new school, he rooms with Gilbert Cocteau, a gorgeous loner of a boy who sells his body for reasons unknown. Serge's attempts to reach out to Gilbert fail spectacularly, and yet there is something in both of them that attracts them to each other.

en: Various people take care of their pet dogs.

en-us: Music video for the song Akahana no Tonakai by Peggy Hayama and the NHK Tokyo Jidou Gasshoudan that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. It is considered to be lost media.
en: Music video for the song Akahana no Tonakai by Peggy Hayama and the NHK Tokyo Jidou Gasshoudan that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. It is considered to be lost media.

en-us:
Continuing from the events of the last series (Shakugan no Shana II), both Shana and Kazumi stand at their respective locations waiting for Yuji to meet with one of them, only to discover that Yuji has disappeared, with not even the slightest evidence of his existence left behind. All is not lost however, as the letters the two of them sent to him still give hope of Yuji's continued existence. As Shana and company search for answers on Yuji's whereabouts, they soon find the truth staring back at them when Yuji reappears in front of them as the leader of Bal Masqué. Left with little choice, Shana must now confront her most unlikely adversary on the battlefield in her toughest challenge yet.

(Source: Anime News Network)
en:
Continuing from the events of the last series (Shakugan no Shana II), both Shana and Kazumi stand at their respective locations waiting for Yuji to meet with one of them, only to discover that Yuji has disappeared, with not even the slightest evidence of his existence left behind. All is not lost however, as the letters the two of them sent to him still give hope of Yuji's continued existence. As Shana and company search for answers on Yuji's whereabouts, they soon find the truth staring back at them when Yuji reappears in front of them as the leader of Bal Masqué. Left with little choice, Shana must now confront her most unlikely adversary on the battlefield in her toughest challenge yet.

(Source: Anime News Network)

en-us: Based on the comedy manga by Sonoyama Shunji.
en: Based on the comedy manga by Sonoyama Shunji.

en-us:
It's a Sanrio picture that feels partly like an anime art film and partly like a Warner Bros. cartoon. The film features some very creative imagery, a groovy 70's jazz score, and very little spoken dialogue. It's a story about a dog named Joe that falls in love with a rose and protects it from a mean spirited crow. There's some energetic Fritz Freeling style action. There's also some unexpectedly grim tragedy, not including the anticipated outcome, which does occur as expected.

(Source: animenation.net)
en:
It's a Sanrio picture that feels partly like an anime art film and partly like a Warner Bros. cartoon. The film features some very creative imagery, a groovy 70's jazz score, and very little spoken dialogue. It's a story about a dog named Joe that falls in love with a rose and protects it from a mean spirited crow. There's some energetic Fritz Freeling style action. There's also some unexpectedly grim tragedy, not including the anticipated outcome, which does occur as expected.

(Source: animenation.net)

en-us:
The heated bond between Shana and Yuji is tested as their paranormal adventures continues. The Flame Haze fends off supernatural foes by night. By day, she contends with a classmate who's also after Yuji's heart. Emotions flare as a suspicious transfer student who resembles a recently defeated Denizen clings to Yuji. His training rises in intensity when they catch wind of a revered warrior in search of her lost lover—who will stop at nothing to extract the power keeping Yuji alive!

(Source: FUNimation)
en:
The heated bond between Shana and Yuji is tested as their paranormal adventures continues. The Flame Haze fends off supernatural foes by night. By day, she contends with a classmate who's also after Yuji's heart. Emotions flare as a suspicious transfer student who resembles a recently defeated Denizen clings to Yuji. His training rises in intensity when they catch wind of a revered warrior in search of her lost lover—who will stop at nothing to extract the power keeping Yuji alive!

(Source: FUNimation)

en-us: Momo Yamada wanted to be a flower when she grew up, but she's blossomed into nothing more than a rather homely teenager. When her grandmother passes away, Momo becomes a live-in maid for the two sons of a elegant fashion designer. After the eccentric eldest son, Ranmaru, gives Momo the makeover of her life, she discovers that her mother was a legendary Hanabito, a beautiful woman with a divinely intoxicating scent that draws men to her like bees to nectar. What's more, Momo learns that she, too, gives off that same irresistable aroma. Although she and Ranmaru have fallen in love, their relationship now must withstand constant assault from handsome boys and men who desire to abduct and seduce Momo.
en: Momo Yamada wanted to be a flower when she grew up, but she's blossomed into nothing more than a rather homely teenager. When her grandmother passes away, Momo becomes a live-in maid for the two sons of a elegant fashion designer. After the eccentric eldest son, Ranmaru, gives Momo the makeover of her life, she discovers that her mother was a legendary Hanabito, a beautiful woman with a divinely intoxicating scent that draws men to her like bees to nectar. What's more, Momo learns that she, too, gives off that same irresistable aroma. Although she and Ranmaru have fallen in love, their relationship now must withstand constant assault from handsome boys and men who desire to abduct and seduce Momo.

en-us:
When Nanoka was in middle school, she got her first confession. Feeling that the boy really liked her, she started dating him. Only to find out later that he only used her to show off in front of his friends. Betrayed, Nanoka is now in high school and hesitates getting into another relationship.

Though a chance encounter with a stranger's breakup in a fast food restaurant soon changes her mind. Both her and the stranger were betrayed in their first relationships...and this brings up a different feeling in her heart. After seeing the stranger again in the streets, she makes her first confession with him. Only to find out that they are from two different worlds.

(Source: Chibi Manga)

Includes five bonus chapters.
en:
When Nanoka was in middle school, she got her first confession. Feeling that the boy really liked her, she started dating him. Only to find out later that he only used her to show off in front of his friends. Betrayed, Nanoka is now in high school and hesitates getting into another relationship.

Though a chance encounter with a stranger's breakup in a fast food restaurant soon changes her mind. Both her and the stranger were betrayed in their first relationships...and this brings up a different feeling in her heart. After seeing the stranger again in the streets, she makes her first confession with him. Only to find out that they are from two different worlds.

(Source: Chibi Manga)

Includes five bonus chapters.

en-us:
A beautiful dog has thrown the imperial palace into chaos. As the Heian period nears its end, Takasaki - whose lowly beginnings as the mere third son of a warrior family put him at a disadvantage in a society obsessed with rank and titles - has managed to climb the social ladder by spending the night with many a powerful man. Eventually Takasaki even becomes a favorite of the retired emperor himself. Stares of fear and envy have followed the gorgeous upstart at every turn, yet behind the gaze of Tomozane, the son of a powerful noble, lies a calm warmth, which makes Takasaki uncomfortable. But something happens that will change their relationship forever...

(Source: Renta!)
en:
A beautiful dog has thrown the imperial palace into chaos. As the Heian period nears its end, Takasaki - whose lowly beginnings as the mere third son of a warrior family put him at a disadvantage in a society obsessed with rank and titles - has managed to climb the social ladder by spending the night with many a powerful man. Eventually Takasaki even becomes a favorite of the retired emperor himself. Stares of fear and envy have followed the gorgeous upstart at every turn, yet behind the gaze of Tomozane, the son of a powerful noble, lies a calm warmth, which makes Takasaki uncomfortable. But something happens that will change their relationship forever...

(Source: Renta!)

en-us:
Friends since childhood, Haru and Hana do not have a typical relationship -- Hana is human, and Haru is her werewolf who must protect her. Although werewolves are starting to have more rights, they are still seen as exotic beasts by society. As the two fall in love, what will be their fate?

(Source: WEBTOONS)
en:
Friends since childhood, Haru and Hana do not have a typical relationship -- Hana is human, and Haru is her werewolf who must protect her. Although werewolves are starting to have more rights, they are still seen as exotic beasts by society. As the two fall in love, what will be their fate?

(Source: WEBTOONS)

en-us:
The day he met her was the worst day in his life.

Wizards are short-lived people who can turn people they touch into one of their own, making them an abomination to the world. One day, the wizard Louis meets a naive girl named Emma on the street. When he unexpectedly touches Emma and turn her into a wizard, Louie's ordinary life changes completely...? This is a love story between wizards, between a man and a woman, a romance as delicate as a flower.

(Source: Bunkasha, translated)

When he unexpectedly touches Emma and turn her into a wizard, Louie's ordinary life changes completely...? This is a love story between wizards, between a man and a woman, a romance as delicate as a flower.

(Source: Bunkasha, translated)

en-us:
Shiraishi Kouta is a high school boy blessed with intelligence, good looks, popularity. There isn’t a girl that hasn’t fallen for him...that is, until the princely girl Kurokawa Kaori comes under his radar. While trying to get Kurokawa to fall for him, her badass ways get Shiraishi flustered instead!

(Source: Manga UP!)
